Posts.Content: Misfit95 wrote: Hello, I have not been able to find an in-person support group for Stage IV in San Diego. MBCN.org lists one, but I have learned that it no longer meets due to poor attendance. The closest in-person group that does meet is in Mission Viejo. I was wondering if there is an informal group that meets outside of this forum in the San Diego area? Thanks, Sandy Dx 3/13/2013, Stage IV, mets, ER+, HER2+ Chemotherapy 3/28/2013 Taxotere (docetaxel) Targeted Therapy 7/31/2013 Herceptin (trastuzumab) Targeted Therapy 8/1/2013 Perjeta (pertuzumab) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Informal Stage IV in-person group in San Diego? Misfit95 Misfit95
